name: Legacy 2345
body:
### Legacy 2345
It is the year 2345 and humankind is colonizing planets in far-off star systems, but faster-than-light travel is a proven impossibility. Your goal is to establish a colony on an unknown Earth-like world and not just explore and survive, but thrive.

What will you find?

_What will find you?_
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
